american_chopper_argument.name: American Chopper Argument
american_chopper_argument.description: Great for showcasing a debate with two opposing viewpoints, from the reasonable to the absurd.

boardroom_meeting_suggestion.name: Boardroom Meeting Suggestion
boardroom_meeting_suggestion.description: Perfect for illustrating a bad or controversial idea being presented and rejected.

am_i_the_only_one.name: Am I The Only One Around Here
am_i_the_only_one.description: Excellent for expressing a personal, often unpopular, opinion or observation.

ancient_aliens.name: Ancient Aliens
ancient_aliens.description: Ideal for providing a simple, sarcastic, or conspiratorial description for a strange or mysterious event.

bernie_i_am_once_again_asking.name: Bernie I Am Once Again Asking For Your Support
bernie_i_am_once_again_asking.description: Best for humorously depicting a repeated or desperate plea for something.

blank_nut_button.name: Blank Nut Button
blank_nut_button.description: Great for representing a powerful, often uncontrollable, impulse or desire.

captain_picard_facepalm.name: Captain Picard Facepalm
captain_picard_facepalm.description: Perfect for reacting to a moment of extreme stupidity, frustration, or exasperation.

change_my_mind.name: Change My Mind
change_my_mind.description: Suitable for stating a controversial opinion and challenging others to debate it.

disaster_girl.name: Disaster Girl
disaster_girl.description: Ideal for implying that a person is responsible for a disaster and is enjoying the chaos they've caused.

epic_handshake.name: Epic Handshake
epic_handshake.description: Great for showcasing common ground or agreement between two different groups or ideas.

mocking_spongebob.name: Mocking Spongebob
mocking_spongebob.description: Perfect for sarcastically mocking a statement or idea, often with alternating capitalization.

leonardo_dicaprio_cheers.name: Leonardo Dicaprio Cheers
leonardo_dicaprio_cheers.description: Best for making a toast or showing respect to a person, group, or idea.

is_this_a_pigeon.name: Is This A Pigeon
is_this_a_pigeon.description: Excellent for illustrating a lack of understanding or an illogical conclusion.

inhaling_seagull.name: Inhaling Seagull
inhaling_seagull.description: Great for showing an intense, loud, and surprising reaction to a situation.

ill_just_wait_here.name: I'll Just Wait Here
ill_just_wait_here.description: Perfect for conveying a sense of patient, often indefinite, waiting for something that is delayed or may never happen.

hide_the_pain_harold.name: Hide the Pain Harold
hide_the_pain_harold.description: Best for expressing a situation where someone is trying to hide their pain or discomfort with a forced smile.

hard_to_swallow_pills.name: Hard To Swallow Pills
hard_to_swallow_pills.description: Suitable for stating an unpleasant, unpopular, or difficult-to-accept truth.

futurama_fry.name: Futurama Fry
futurama_fry.description: Ideal for expressing uncertainty or a skeptical dilemma about a situation.

finding_neverland.name: Finding Neverland
finding_neverland.description: Great for showing a sad or dramatic realization in response to a simple question.

expanding_brain.name: Expanding Brain
expanding_brain.description: Excellent for illustrating a progression of ideas from simple to progressively more complex, enlightened, or absurd.

monkey_puppet.name: Monkey Puppet
monkey_puppet.description: This meme features a monkey puppet with a silent, awkward expression. It's used to represent the feeling of realizing you've made a mistake or are in an uncomfortable situation.

one_does_not_simply.name: One Does Not Simply
one_does_not_simply.description: This meme features Boromir from 'The Lord of the Rings' and is used to express that a seemingly simple task is, in fact, incredibly difficult.

sad_pablo_escobar.name: Sad Pablo Escobar
sad_pablo_escobar.description: This meme features a sad and lonely-looking Pablo Escobar. It's used to express the feeling of waiting for a long time, often with a sense of boredom, sadness, or impatience.

see_nobody_cares.name: See Nobody Cares
see_nobody_cares.description: This meme is used to dismiss something someone says as unimportant or to show that no one is interested in the topic.

spongebob_ight_imma_head_out.name: Spongebob Ight Imma Head Out
spongebob_ight_imma_head_out.description: This meme features a Spongebob character saying 'Ight, Imma head out'. It's used to express the feeling of wanting to leave an awkward, uncomfortable, or boring situation.

surprised_pikachu.name: Surprised Pikachu
surprised_pikachu.description: This meme features a surprised-looking Pikachu. It's used to express fake or genuine surprise at an outcome that was easy to predict.

the_rock_driving.name: The Rock Driving
the_rock_driving.description: This meme features Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson driving a car, and is used to depict a conversation with a witty, sarcastic, or surprising response.

the_scroll_of_truth.name: The Scroll Of Truth
the_scroll_of_truth.description: This meme features a character reading a scroll of truth. It's used to express an uncomfortable or undeniable truth that the character violently rejects.

tuxedo_winnie_the_pooh.name: Tuxedo Winnie The Pooh
tuxedo_winnie_the_pooh.description: This meme features Winnie the Pooh in both a casual and a sophisticated tuxedo. It's used to contrast a simple, casual idea with an overly formal or sophisticated one.

waiting_skeleton.name: Waiting Skeleton
waiting_skeleton.description: This meme features a skeleton sitting on a bench, implying a very long wait. It's used to express the feeling of waiting for an extremely long period of time.

who_killed_hannibal.name: Who Killed Hannibal
who_killed_hannibal.description: This meme is used to depict a confusing or absurd conversation with a witty, and often confusing, response.

who_would_win.name: Who Would Win
who_would_win.description: This meme is used to compare a powerful or overwhelming force with a trivial or insignificant one, with the expectation that the trivial one will surprisingly win.

woman_yelling_at_cat.name: Woman Yelling At Cat
woman_yelling_at_cat.description: This meme features a split-screen with a woman yelling and a confused-looking cat at a table. It's used to depict a situation where one person is angry or outraged and the other person is indifferent or confused.

x_x_everywhere.name: X, X Everywhere
x_x_everywhere.description: This meme features a character looking overwhelmed by something that is everywhere. It's used to express that something is ubiquitous or overwhelming.

trump_bill_signing.name: Trump Bill Signing
trump_bill_signing.description: Unleash your inner artist or make a bold (and hilarious) declaration! Place any drawing, text, or childish scribble onto President Trump's executive order and watch your decree become law... in meme form, at least.

jack_sparrow_chased.name: Jack Sparrow Being Chased
jack_sparrow_chased.description: It's the perfect visual for running away from your problems! Label Captain Jack with 'Me' and his pursuers with your responsibilities, deadlines, or that awkward text you haven't replied to. We've all been there.

be_like_bill.name: Be Like Bill
be_like_bill.description: Got a pet peeve about social media etiquette? Let Bill say it for you. This stick figure is the master of passive-aggressive advice, calling out annoying behavior one hilarious observation at a time. Be smart. Be like Bill.

brace_yourselves.name: Brace Yourselves X is Coming
brace_yourselves.description: Winter isn't the only thing coming. Use Ned Stark's iconic warning to herald the arrival of anything and everything—from spoilers and final exams to pumpkin spice lattes. It’s the ultimate meme prophecy.

robert_downey_jr_face.name: Robert Downey Jr Smirk
robert_downey_jr_face.description: That feeling when... This classic Robert Downey Jr. expression perfectly captures that internal cringe, smug satisfaction, or awkward silence. Just add the situation and let his face do all the talking.

laughing_men_in_suits.name: And Then I Said
laughing_men_in_suits.description: Ever wonder what corporate executives joke about? This meme gives you a peek. Set up a ridiculous statement with 'And then I said...' to create a hilarious punchline about out-of-touch bosses and workplace absurdities.
